overview: If you didn't need to play by the rules, what would you do? Start an elite, invite only sex club where you're the ultimate gatekeeper. Deciding who's allowed to come in and play; you si tin the shawdows and direct the action. Welcome to XCHIMERA. Directed by Louis Moire and brought to you by LETSDOEIT productions - XBIZ 2018 AWARD WINNER - this is a world that few get to see but all want to be a part of.
title: xChimera 3
